problems.title: Tower of Hanoi (Print Moves)
problems.description:
Given N disks on peg A, move them to peg C using peg B as auxiliary, following Tower of Hanoi rules: move one disk at a time, never place a larger disk on top of a smaller one. Use recursion to print the sequence of moves.

Input Format:
A single integer N.

Output Format:
Print each move on a new line in the format "A C" meaning move top disk from peg A to peg C.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
2

Sample Output
A B
A C
B C

testCases.expectedOutput:
A B
A C
B C

hintsList: Classic recursion: move n-1 from A to B, move largest from A to C, then move n-1 from B to C.
